rows.name: Witchsign
rows.description: The next living creature born within 1 mile is mutated.

rows.name: Soured Milk
rows.description: All milk within @Roll[1d100] yards goes sour instantly.

rows.name: Blight
rows.description: Willpower Bonus fields within Willpower Bonus miles suffer a blight, and all crops rot overnight.

rows.name: Soulwax
rows.description: Your ears clog instantly with a thick wax. Gain 1 Deafened Condition, which is not removed until someone cleans them for you (with a successful use of the Heal Skill).

rows.name: Witchlight
rows.description: You glow with an eerie light related to your Lore, emitting as much light as a large bonfire, which lasts for 1d10 Rounds.

rows.name: Fell Whispers
rows.description: Pass a Routine (+20) Willpower Test or gain 1 Corruption point.

rows.name: Rupture
rows.description: Your nose, eyes, and ears bleed profusely. Gain 1d10 Bleeding Conditions.

rows.name: Soulquake
rows.description: Gain the Prone Condition.

rows.name: Unfasten
rows.description: On your person, every buckle unfastens, and every lace unties, which may cause belts to fall, pouches to open, bags to fall, and armour to slip.

rows.name: Wayward Garb
rows.description: Your clothes seem to writhe with a mind of their own. Receive 1 Entangled Condition with a Strength of 1d10Ã—5 to resist.

rows.name: Curse of Temperence
rows.description: All alcohol within @Roll[1d100] yards goes bad, tasting bitter and foul.

rows.name: Souldrain
rows.description: Gain 1 Fatigued Condition, which remains for @Roll[1d10] hours.

rows.name: Driven to Distraction
rows.description: If engaged in combat, gain the Surprised Condition. Otherwise, you are completely startled, your heart racing, and unable to concentrate for a few moments.

rows.name: Unholy Visions
rows.description: Fleeting visions of profane and unholy acts harass you. Receive a Blinded Condition; pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gain another.

rows.name: Cloying Tongue
rows.description: All Language Tests (including Casting Tests) suffer a -10 penalty for @Roll[1d10] Rounds.

rows.name: The Horror!
rows.description: Pass a Hard (-20) Cool Test or gain 1 Broken Condition.

rows.name: Curse of Corruption
rows.description: Gain 1 Corruption point.

rows.name: Double Trouble
rows.description: The effect of the spell you cast occurs elsewhere within @Roll[1d10] miles. At the GM's discretion, where possible it should have consequences.

rows.name: Multiplying Misfortune
rows.description: Roll twice on this table, rerolling any results between 91-00.

rows.name: Cascading Chaos
rows.description: Roll again on the Major Miscast Table.
